Unusual user access patterns to CRM soft.Data: Windows Event ID 4624, Windows Event ID 4625, Zeek conn.log
Unusual user access patterns to CRM soft.Action: Analyze Windows Event ID 4624/4625 for login attempts to systems hosting CRM or CRM interfaces. Analyze Zeek conn.log for connections to CRM servers. Identify dormant or infrequently used accounts accessing CRM. Use correlation analysis to link logins to source IPs and compare against known user behavior patterns. Flag access from rare source IPs or devices based on frequency analysis.

Large volume data downloads or exports i.Action: Monitor Zeek http.log for large file download indicators or excessive data transfer volume associated with CRM endpoints/URLs. Analyze Zeek conn.log for unusually large outbound connections from CRM servers or systems known to interact with CRM. Use statistical analysis (e.g., IQR, percentile analysis) on transfer sizes/volumes per user/endpoint to identify outliers.
